Description: Sandstone stela of Rebeka; pediment at the top; Coptic text; two stylized ankh-signs below in the upper panel-spandrels.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.134, Pl.95)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 94:2 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
